name: BeansGame.io
description:
BeansGame.io was made in one night, so if there any glitches and you're making a video, I'll probably fix them. (although I made this game in Scratch as a joke, so I might not.) Do you like beans? If not, why are you looking at this? Even if you don't like beans, this game is still fun!

How to play

BeansGame.io is a game of red light, beans light. Collect as many beans as possible to get the most points out of 5 players, and win! (multiplayer not yet tested.)

Source code

You may use the source code as long as you credit me. The file is an sb3, so if you want to make a mod, you'll need to use Scratch.
